mapper.select: select A.IDX ,B.WORK_ID ,B.WORK_NM ,C.CMPY_ID ,C.CMPY_NM ,D.BRAND_ID ,D.BRAND_NM ,A.AMT_YEAR ,A.AMT_MONTH ,A.AMT_TERM ,A.SALES_MONEY ,A.AMT_MONEY ,A.AMT_KAKAO_MONEY ,A.NET_SALES_MONEY ,A.REFUND_MONEY ,A.TARGET_COUNT ,A.PERFORM_COUNT from TB_SMB_SALES A ,TB_SMB_WORK B ,TB_SMB_COMPANY C ,TB_SMB_BRAND D where A.WORK_ID = B.WORK_ID and A.CMPY_ID = C.CMPY_ID and A.BRAND_ID = D.BRAND_ID order by A.AMT_YEAR desc, A.AMT_MONTH desc

select A.IDX ,B.WORK_ID ,B.WORK_NM ,C.CMPY_ID ,C.CMPY_NM ,D.BRAND_ID ,D.BRAND_NM ,A.AMT_YEAR ,A.AMT_MONTH ,A.AMT_TERM ,A.SALES_MONEY ,A.AMT_MONEY ,A.AMT_KAKAO_MONEY ,A.NET_SALES_MONEY ,A.REFUND_MONEY ,A.TARGET_COUNT ,A.PERFORM_COUNT from TB_SMB_SALES A ,TB_SMB_WORK B ,TB_SMB_COMPANY C ,TB_SMB_BRAND D where A.WORK_ID = B.WORK_ID and A.CMPY_ID = C.CMPY_ID and A.BRAND_ID = D.BRAND_ID and A.IDX = #{idx}
select WORK_ID ,WORK_NM from TB_SMB_WORK order by WORK_ID
select CMPY_ID ,CMPY_NM from TB_SMB_COMPANY order by CMPY_ID
select BRAND_ID ,BRAND_NM from TB_SMB_BRAND order by BRAND_ID
